title: OER-Based Elementary Science Curriculum Design and Open Pedagogy Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Education Knowledge and Understanding of Pedagogy
context.additional_context: Online instructional design competency development for pre-service/in-service teachers using OER materials and open pedagogy frameworks.

learning_goals: Learners can re-edit and reorganize elementary science textbooks using OER materials.
Learners can design collaborative online science education activities following open pedagogy principles.
Learners can understand copyright regulations according to OER licenses and apply them to educational materials.

resources: Free OER Platforms (Wikibooks, OER Commons, etc.)
Digital Authoring Tools (Google Docs, Canva, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
